official_title: A bill to amend section 129 of title 23, United States Code to permit the operation of certain ferryboats between the islands comprising the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Permits the operation of ferryboats between the islands comprising the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 129)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 129 of title 23, United States Code to permit the operation of certain ferryboats between the islands comprising the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.
